# Government of Canada Tender Announcement
### Services Required for the Stream to Sea Program and Community Outreach

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Contracting Entity:** Fisheries and Oceans Canada
**Government of Canada's tender number:** PW-22-01004856
**Publication Date:** August 19, 2022
**Tender Closes on:** September 2, 2022, at 13:00:00 Eastern Time
**Region of Opportunity:** Canada
**Region of Delivery:** British Columbia

**Summary:**
Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) seeks a contractor to provide delivery and coordination services for the Stream to Sea program and related community outreach activities. The contractor will work in the North Okanagan - Shuswap area of British Columbia. The services required include:

* Coordinating classroom incubators
* Delivering salmon eggs to schools
* Providing teacher in-service training
* Coordinating community outreach activities
* Maintaining accurate records of all eggs transferred and fish released

The contractor will also be responsible for coordinating:

* Salmonid in the Classroom and Stream to Sea Activities
* Curriculum/Activity In-services for teachers
* Storm Drain Marking Program
* Community Outreach and other activities

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Work with the Community Advisor (CA) to develop a work plan for the region
* Coordinate and assist with the set-up of classroom incubators
* Deliver salmon eggs to schools and provide teacher in-service training
* Liaise with school districts to arrange support for the program
* Provide technical support and arrange equipment and supplies
* Coordinate egg deliveries with local hatcheries
* Keep accurate records of all eggs transferred and fish released
* Encourage participation from teachers and recognize years of service

**Eligibility and Evaluation Criteria:**
Contractors must meet the eligibility criteria and evaluation criteria outlined in the solicitation document.

**How to Submit:**
To submit a proposal, access the Government of Canada's CanadaBuy registration system and follow the instructions provided. Please ensure that your proposal is submitted in both official languages (English and French).
